price: 41. En zeker, Wij hebben in deze Qor’aan uitgelegd zodat zij acht mogen slaan, maar het doet hen in slechtheid en tegenzin vermeerderen.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ وَمَا يَزِيدُهُمۡ إِلَّا نُفُورٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnā fī hādhā al-qur'āni liyadhakkarū wamā yazīduhum illā nufūran
